title: Manchester City to give teenage sensation Jadon Sancho new deal in effort to fend off Arsenal and Chelsea
text:
Sport Manchester City to give teenage sensation Jadon Sancho new deal in effort to fend off Arsenal and Chelsea Arsenal and Chelsea were hot on the trail of the 17-year-old who joined City from Watford for £500,000 in 2015 Share Jadon Sancho in action (Photo: Manchester Evening News) Share Get   Thank you for subscribing!   
Manchester City are set to give top teenager Jadon Sancho a mega deal to keep the England prospect. 
Arsenal and Chelsea were hot on the trail of the 17-year-old who joined City from Watford for £500,000 in 2015. 
City are ready to tie him down with a three year deal worth in excess of £30,000-a-week for the midfield starlet. 
Sancho is seen as one of their best talents at the academy but is yet to make a first team appearance. 
The youngster is primarily a left winger but can also operate up front or on the right. Like us on Facebook
